mapper.select: SELECT F.id AS feedback_id , F.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , F.type , F.file_id , F.receive_email_yn , F.created_at , CASE WHEN F.answer_content IS NOT NULL AND F.answered_at IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS answer_yn FROM FEEDBACK F INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = F.user_id ORDER BY F.created_at DESC

SELECT F.id AS feedback_id , F.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , F.type , F.content , F.file_id , CASE WHEN F.file_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = F.file_id ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC LIMIT 1) ELSE NULL END AS first_file_url , F.receive_email_yn , F.created_at , F.answer_content , F.answered_at FROM FEEDBACK F INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = F.user_id WHERE F.id = #{feedbackId}
SELECT email FROM USER WHERE id = (SELECT user_id FROM FEEDBACK WHERE id = #{feedbackId})
SELECT kor_name FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE code_key = 'FEEDBACK_TYPE' AND eng_name = (SELECT type FROM FEEDBACK WHERE id = #{feedbackId})
